text: Death Race: Beyond Anarchy (also known as Death Race 4: Beyond Anarchy or Death Race 4) is a 2018 American science fiction action film directed by Don Michael Paul. It is the fourth and final installment of the Death Race remake film series, the fifth installment of the Death Race film series, and a direct sequel to Death Race (2008). The film was released on DVD and digitally on October 2, 2018. The film received mixed reviews from critics. title: Death Beyond Anarchy
